item.title: Al Jardine
item.description: Alan Charles Jardine is an American musician, singer, and songwriter who co-founded the Beach Boys. He is best known as the band's rhythm guitarist and for occasionally singing lead vocals on songs such as 'Help Me, Rhonda' (1965), 'Then I Kissed Her' (1965), and 'Come Go with Me' (1978). His song 'Lady Lynda' became a UK top 10 hit for the group in 1978.
